price: 15 mais sans savoir que son Seigneur l’observait.
arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīran
